products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Recycled Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.
